### About

Victor Caña Bozada, PhD student in Science at the Centro de Investigación en Alimentación y Desarrollo (CIAD), Mazatlán, México. I am Interested in continuing the genomic exploration of monogeneans through the use of bioinformatics tools.   
I am currently working on the assembly of the transcriptomes of two species of monogeneous for the evolutionary understanding of this group. In addition, the genomic information of species of the Monogenea class is explored for the identification of drug targets and the
